name: system-notification-task-resolved
description: System default template for task resolution notifications
templateBody:
{{#if (eq channel 'email')}}Hello {{recipientName}},

{{/if}}[{{publisherName}}] @{{thread.createdBy}} resolved Task with Id: {{thread.task.id}} for Asset {{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}
Current Status: Resolved{{#if (eq channel 'email')}}

Happy Exploring!
Thanks.{{/if}}
